name: !POP! Art Necklace
description: Plastique* !POP! Art Necklace We're huge fans of the likes of Warhol, Lichtenstein, Niki de Saint Phalle, Hockney and everything Pop Art! This Warhol-inspired Pop Art necklace definitely packs a punch, both visually and physically. Made from 5 different coloured acrylic pieces all layered together, this piece is solid through and through. They say diamonds are a girl's best friend and what's better than 4 of them all in different pop colours? Details the pendent is cut from 3mm red, teal, purple, orange and white acrylic and is a 50mm x 50mm square. it hangs from a silver-plated chain approximately 18" in total length.

name: Art Nouveau Necklace
description: Plastique* Art Nouveau Necklace Show your arty and delicate side with this intricately cut Art Nouveau inspired necklace! Details The pendent is laser cut from 3mm black acrylic. it is 95mm wide and 40mm tall. The chain is silver-plated, approximately 18" in total length.

name: Retro Cassette Tape Necklace
description: Plastique* Retro Cassette Tape Necklace Do you yearn for the days of the mixtape? This acrylic cassette tape necklace is inspired by such love. There is even space at the top for you to add your own mixtape label! Details The pendent is laser cut from 3mm black acrylic. it is 50mm wide and 32mm tall. The chain is silver-plated, approximately 18" in total length. NOTE: chain may differ slightly from the one seen in the photo.

name: Reel to Reel Acrylic Necklace
description: Plastique* Reel to Reel Acrylic Necklace Love that retro vibe? Do you miss the days of the reel to reel? Or maybe you just think it looks really rad! Either way, this necklace is inspired by the love of vintage audio formats. Show your love for real music! None of this digital MP3 stuff! Details The pendent is laser cut from 3mm black acrylic. it is 45mm wide and 45mm tall. The chain is silver-plated, approximately 18" in total length. NOTE: chain may differ slightly from the one seen in the photo.

name: 3D Drawing Pad
description: Bicycle Paper Clips Put on your 3D specs and see your doodles float above the page with this cool 3D drawing pad! Who needs Avatar! Pad is A5 sized and comes with a pair of super retro 3D spectacles! NOTE: Do not draw in blue or red, black works best - Vary your viewing distance - Make sure the room is well lit. Contents: 50 x sheets to a pad 1 x 3D specs

name: Turntable Record Player Acrylic Necklace
description: Plastique* Turntable Record Player Acrylic Necklace Calling all you vinyl record junkies! This 3-dimensional turntable necklace is perfect for you! Featuring a raised record deck and tone arm, this necklace will surely make you stand out from the crowd! Details The pendent is laser cut from 3mm black, white and translucent red acrylic. it is 50mm wide and 35mm tall. The chain is silver-plated, approximately 18" in total length. NOTE: chain may differ slightly from the one seen in the photo.
